title: S14 Ep102: Supernatural News/Parashare: Paranormal Redemption Edition

description:
BEYOND the DARKNESS has Supernatural News Paranormal Redemption Edition PLUS Your Stories of strange phenomena!

We examine Ghost Hunting for Dummies with Zak Bagans, Ghost Nation Returns, The Devil Made Them Do It with the return of The Conjuring movie franchise, and the possible return and redemption of Ryan Buell & Paranormal State? The spirits are restless down under and strange porn catergories thanks to a rise in the paranormal!
